column5: I am planning a fly-in trip to Lake Evans, Quebec next year. It is through American Bushman, headquartered in Pennsylvania. Has anyone ever outfitted with them before, and if so, what type of experience did you have? Also, how was the fishing and what lures were used? Thanks!-Swick

have fished evans one time about five years ago lots of huge northerns and plenty of walleye used jigs and spoons. american bushman are topnotch. fished camiscane a year later, the best trip ever. some friends are going this june to some new lakes with american bushman.
